page.title: 13 Golden Sea Hot Food Shop.
page.content: The Golden Sea Fish and Chip Shop is owned by Mr.P.Wan.It has been established in the village since 1981. His wife and elder daughter assist him in the shop,which is open six days a week (not Sundays) from 12 noon to 1.30 pm and 4.45pm to 10.30pm.As well as the usual fish and chips,he sells Chinese food,which can be ordered in advance and taken away.Different kinds of rices,Chow Mein,Chop suey and chicken dishes are proving to be popular as well as traditional English meals like steak and chips with mushrooms.Soft drinks are also available. Chow Mein is a dish made from noodles, with various sorts of meat.Chop Suey is made from beansprouts and vegetables.
